title: So, what do you guys really think about this change?

body:
I'm interested on what you guys actually think, now that we don't have a choice beside using them or leaving, about this new board system.
I've seen discussions on this before, but now that the forums are actually gone, I expect more people than ever to come using these even if it is just to show their disgust in the hopes that Riot re-release the forums for us, which actually wouldn't be that bad of an idea if the support was there.

It's a shame that they have actually put it in to archive mode but at the same time, I don't really mind too much.
Some people hate that this style is very reminiscent of Reddit, but I don't really care, I'll continue to use this as it is now the only means of communication I/we have with each other besides the actual client itself.

This has its downsides and its positives, but I'm more happy than disappointed with this introduction and I do hope that it turns out to be a success.
People have left already and I hope more have joined.

Just give me your opinions and thoughts, whether it's one word or a million, I'm interested in hearing it, thanks.
